How to implement a Transformer ?#

The transformer architecture powers currently almost every state-of-the-art deep learning model. Here, we provide an implementation of the transformer architecture originally published by Vaswani et al. in 2017.

See also

  Vaswani A. et al., "Attention is all you need", 2017, https://arxiv.org/abs/1706.03762.
